questions.question: When can I visit the school?
questions.answer: We welcome visits during school hours. Please call ahead to arrange a convenient time for a campus tour.

questions.question: What are the application deadlines?
questions.answer: Applications are accepted throughout the year. For optimal processing, apply by November for enrollment the following February.

questions.question: Do you offer payment plans?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer flexible payment arrangements. Contact the admissions office to discuss options.

questions.question: What is your late fee policy?
questions.answer: Please contact our office for information regarding fee payment deadlines and policies.
